Data Structures
Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
 Civr_blobA 2d integer vector
 Civr_clientA client that can connect to and communicate with an instance of the Ilium VR runtime. Access only as an opaque pointer, as the contents of the struct will change between operating systems
 Civr_client_paramsParameters for generating a runtime client
 Civr_game_packetA packet returned by ivrClientGetGamePacket when the runtime is set to the IVR_RUNTIME_MODE_GAME mode
 Civr_mat3A 3x3 column-major matrix
 Civr_mat4A 4x4 column-major matrix
 Civr_quatA quaternion, representing orientations without gimbal lock
 Civr_raw_packetA packet returned by ivrClientGetRawPacket when the runtime is set to the IVR_RUNTIME_MODE_RAW mode
 Civr_vec2A 2d vector
 Civr_vec3A 3d vector
 Civr_vec4A 4d vector
  • Generated by 1.8.11
